author: Tim Daniels
title: Bengals Chaplain LaMorris Crawford Recovering After Coronavirus Diagnosis
description: LaMorris Crawford, the  Cincinnati Bengals ' team chaplain, said he thought he was "going to die" after contracting the coronavirus in March and experiencing extreme symptoms...
content:
Michael Conroy/Associated Press
LaMorris Crawford, the Cincinnati Bengals' team chaplain, said he thought he was "going to die" after contracting the coronavirus in March and experiencing extreme symptoms.
